subject: Basketball
Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: The son of North Carolina State basketball coach Sidney Lowe pleaded guilty to dozens of charges connected to a March 2007 armed robbery. A sentencing hearing for Sidney Lowe II, 23, is expected to end Tuesday in Greensboro, N.C.
snippet: The son of North Carolina State basketball coach Sidney Lowe pleaded guilty to dozens of charges connected to a March 2007 armed robbery. A sentencing hearing for Sidney Lowe II, 23, is expected to end Tuesday in Greensboro, N.C.
